name: Premier 2: Superleague
description: Premier 2: Superleague is a standard football management game, in which you take charge of a team in the 16 team super-league and aim for league success. You can choose your team and substitutes for each match, with injuries and suspensions to factor in as the season goes on. You can use the substitutes at half-time or later in the matches (which last for 90 seconds of real -time). Between matches you can buy and sell players, each of which have ratings up to 9 for ability and form.

shot.caption: Loading screen
Enter the manager's name
Enter the skill level
The main menu
You can change the names of the teams and the players
The list of teams...as you can see we have no name, you have to insert it yourself
And just for the heck of it we'll be Chelsea
The fixtures
The league table
And here is our squad...which just happens to be the England team...lovely
And this is the squad of our opposition...and in fact any of the other teams for that matter
The transfer market, here you insert the number of the team and the player's number
And I have managed to locate Norwich City's number 3...but he costs far too much money so I'll have to pass
You can also sell players...so let's sell Beardsley...controversial but I'm doing it
Seems like a fair offer...it's a deal!
The latest financial statement
Pre match report...and brilliant Mabbutt's injured!
Looks like Adams is starting then
And here are the starting line-ups for both teams
The stats of both teams
The players are ready, and the referee is ready, it's time to kick off!
Spurs attack...
And it's a goal!  1-0 to Tottenham!
It's half time....and here are the other half time scores for your service
We're behind and need goals, so let's take off Hodge and Cottee will come in for a four-man attack
And there's the equaliser!  The manager's change of tactics for the second half has paid off!
Heading into injury time now
AND WOULD YOU BELIEVE IT!!  Chelsea have only gone and won it right at the death!  Spurs will be absolutely gutted!
And it's all over!  Chelsea have won this derby match 2-1 in the most dramatic of circumstances!  And now for a look at the other results from the league, including an eight-goal thriller!
It was bittersweet in the end though as we have another injury to deal with!
